Articles.Content:
Is there any way to fix this? Whenever i launch ksp it loads untl the last item and then i get the message "ksp.exe has stopped working"

Please help!

Hi Ateballgaming,

I have moved your thread to the correct subforum to deal with issues like this, Support (unmodded installs). If you are using mods, contact one of many moderators, and it will be moved to Support (modded installs). For the issue to be solved, we must have more information. This thread will tell you what goes into the ideal bug report, and how to find that stuff.

Have a nice day

Hi Ateballgaming,

I have moved your thread to the correct subforum to deal with issues like this, Support (unmodded installs). If you are using mods, contact one of many moderators, and it will be moved to Support (modded installs). For the issue to be solved, we must have more information. This thread will tell you what goes into the ideal bug report, and how to find that stuff.

Have a nice day

I was able to fix the game, just had to uninstall the mod

raibowtrout i dont understand why you moved it to unmoded installs when he clearly states that its a problem with the kerbal galaxy mod

ateballgaming if i remember correctly, the kerbal galaxy is a work in progress (WIP) and it has not been released to KSP 1.0.x

The last version is for the beta 0.90 so problems in the 1.0 are expected. Try to contact the mod developer for an upgrade.

In the worst case scenario its a dead mod

raibowtrout i dont understand why you moved it to unmoded installs when he clearly states that its a problem with the kerbal galaxy mod

ateballgaming if i remember correctly, the kerbal galaxy is a work in progress (WIP) and it has not been released to KSP 1.0.x

The last version is for the beta 0.90 so problems in the 1.0 are expected. Try to contact the mod developer for an upgrade.

In the worst case scenario its a dead mod

Oh ok, it makes sense though since most, if not all, of the comments say how buggy the mod is so unfortunately i think the mod is pretty much dead :/
